properties.areaDesc: Northern Phillips; Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 2:07PM MST until February 9 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
with up to 7 inches in the Little Rockies. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Phillips and Petroleum Counties.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will likely mix with or change over to
rain for a period of time across Petroleum and far southern
Phillips County Saturday afternoon. This area may also get dry-
slotted for a time through much of Saturday afternoon with the
brunt of precipitation not arriving until Saturday evening and
night.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY
